from constants import BLACK, WHITE, BLUE, RED, GREEN, YELLOW, ALPHABET
import tffm as tffm_module



[docs]def print_header(x_coord, y_coord, output):
    dtd_url = "http://www.w3.org/TR/2001/REC-SVG-20010904/DTD/svg10.dtd"
    svg_url = "http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
    xlink_url = "http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"
    output.write("""
                 <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
                 <!DOCTYPE svg PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD SVG 1.0//EN" "%s">
                 <svg height="%d" width="%d" xmlns="%s" xmlns:xlink="%s">
                 """%(dtd_url, x_coord, y_coord, svg_url, xlink_url))




[docs]def print_footer(output):
    output.write("\n</svg>\n")




[docs]def print_ic(length, information_content, output, x_coord, y_coord):
    output.write("<text x=\"%f\" y=\"%d\">\n"%(
        x_coord / 2 + 30 * (length - 1), y_coord + 45))
    output.write("IC = %.2f\n</text>\n"%(information_content))




[docs]def draw_axis(length, output, x_coord, y_coord):
    output.write("<line x1=\"%d\" y1=\"%d\" "%(x_coord + 5, y_coord))
    output.write("x2=\"%d\" y2=\"%d\" "%(
        x_coord + 7 + 60 * length, y_coord))
    output.write("style=\"stroke:rgb(99,99,99);stroke-width:2\" />\n")
    for i in range(0, length + 1):
        draw_rectangle(x_coord + 5 + 60 * i, y_coord, 7, 2, output)
        if i < length:
            output.write("<text x=\"%f\" y=\"%d\">\n"%(x_coord + 27 + 60 * i,
                                                       y_coord + 20))
            output.write("%d\n</text>\n"%(i+1))




[docs]def draw_y_axis(output, x_coord=80, y_coord=120):
    output.write("<line x1=\"%d\" y1=\"%d\" "%(x_coord, y_coord - 8))
    output.write("x2=\"%d\" y2=\"%d\" "%(x_coord, y_coord - 110))
    output.write("style=\"stroke:rgb(99,99,99);stroke-width:2\" />\n")
    draw_rectangle(x_coord - 7, y_coord - 10, 2, 7, output)
    output.write("<text x=\"%d\" y=\"%d\">\n0\n</text>\n"%(x_coord - 17,
                                                           y_coord - 5))
    draw_rectangle(x_coord - 7, y_coord - 60, 2, 7, output)
    output.write("<text x=\"%d\" y=\"%d\">\n1\n</text>\n"%(x_coord - 17,
                                                           y_coord - 55))
    draw_rectangle(x_coord - 7, y_coord - 110, 2, 7, output)
    output.write("<text x=\"%d\" y=\"%d\">\n2\n</text>\n"%(x_coord - 17,
                                                           y_coord - 105))
    output.write("<text x=\"%d\" y=\"%d\"\n"%(x_coord - 30, y_coord - 55))
    output.write("transform=\"rotate(-90, %d, %d)\">\n"%(x_coord - 30,
                                                         y_coord - 50))
    output.write("bits\n</text>\n")




[docs]def draw_ellipse(x_center, y_center, x_radius, y_radius, output, color=BLACK,
        opacity=1.0):
    output.write("<ellipse cx=\"%f\" cy=\"%f\" rx=\"%f\" ry=\"%f\" "%(x_center,
        y_center, x_radius, y_radius))
    output.write("fill=\"rgb%s\" style=\"fill-opacity:%.2f\" />\n"%(str(color),
        opacity))




[docs]def draw_polygon(pts, output, color=BLACK, opacity=1.0):
    output.write("<polygon points=\" ")
    for i in range(0, len(pts) - 1):
        output.write("%f, %f, "%(pts[i][0], pts[i][1]))
    output.write("%f, %f\" "%(pts[len(pts)-1][0], pts[len(pts)-1][1]))
    output.write("fill=\"rgb%s\" style=\"fill-opacity:%.2f\" />\n"%(str(color),
        opacity))




[docs]def draw_rectangle(x_coord, y_coord, height, width, output, color=BLACK,
        opacity=1.0):
    output.write("<rect height=\"%f\" width=\"%f\" "%(height, width))
    output.write("x=\"%f\" y=\"%f\" "%(x_coord, y_coord))
    output.write("fill=\"rgb%s\" style=\"fill-opacity:%.2f\" />\n"%(str(color),
        opacity))




[docs]def draw_letter_a(x_coord, y_coord, xsize, ysize, output, color=RED,
        opacity=1.0):
    output.write("<!-- Begin 'A' -->\n")
    pt1 = (x_coord, y_coord + ysize)
    pt2 = (x_coord + xsize * 0.42, y_coord)
    pt3 = (x_coord + xsize * 0.58, y_coord)
    pt4 = (x_coord + xsize, y_coord + ysize)
    pt5 = (x_coord + 0.85 * xsize, y_coord + ysize)
    pt6 = (x_coord + 0.725 * xsize, y_coord + 0.75 * ysize)
    pt7 = (x_coord + 0.275 * xsize, y_coord + 0.75 * ysize)
    pt8 = (x_coord + 0.15 * xsize, y_coord + ysize)
    points = [pt1, pt2, pt3, pt4, pt5, pt6, pt7, pt8]
    draw_polygon(points, output, color, opacity)
    if ysize > 8:
        pt1 = (x_coord + 0.5 * xsize, y_coord + 0.2 * ysize)
        pt2 = (x_coord + 0.34 * xsize, y_coord + 0.6 * ysize - 1)
        pt3 = (x_coord + 0.64 * xsize, y_coord + 0.6 * ysize - 1)
        draw_polygon([pt1, pt2, pt3], output, WHITE)
    output.write("<!-- End 'A' -->\n")




[docs]def draw_letter_c(x_coord, y_coord, xsize, ysize, output, color=BLUE,
        opacity=1.0):
    output.write("<!-- Begin 'C' -->\n")
    draw_ellipse(x_coord + xsize / 2, y_coord + ysize / 2, xsize / 2,
            ysize / 2, output, color, opacity)
    draw_ellipse(x_coord + xsize / 2, y_coord + ysize / 2, xsize / 3,
            ysize / 3, output, WHITE)
    draw_rectangle(x_coord + xsize / 2, y_coord + ysize / 4, 0.5 * ysize,
            xsize / 2, output, WHITE)
    output.write("<!-- End 'C' -->\n")




[docs]def draw_letter_g(x_coord, y_coord, xsize, ysize, output, color=YELLOW,
        opacity=1.0):
    output.write("<!-- Begin 'G' -->\n")
    draw_ellipse(x_coord + xsize / 2, y_coord + ysize / 2, xsize / 2,
            ysize / 2, output, color, opacity)
    draw_ellipse(x_coord + xsize / 2, y_coord + ysize / 2, xsize / 3,
            ysize / 3, output, WHITE)
    draw_rectangle(x_coord + xsize / 2, y_coord + ysize / 4, ysize / 2,
            xsize / 2, output, WHITE)
    draw_rectangle(x_coord + xsize / 2, y_coord + 5 * ysize / 8, ysize / 8,
            xsize / 2, output, color, opacity)
    draw_rectangle(x_coord + 7 * xsize / 8, y_coord + 5 * ysize / 8,
            ysize - 5 * ysize / 8, xsize / 8, output, color, opacity)
    output.write("<!-- End 'G' -->\n")




[docs]def draw_letter_t(x_coord, y_coord, xsize, ysize, output, color=GREEN,
        opacity=1.0):
    output.write("<!-- Begin 'T' -->\n")
    draw_rectangle(x_coord, y_coord, 0.16 * ysize, xsize, output, color,
            opacity)
    draw_rectangle(x_coord + 0.4 * xsize, y_coord, ysize, .2 * xsize,
            output, color, opacity)
    output.write("<!-- End 'T' -->\n")




[docs]def draw_left_letters(output):
    draw_letter_a(10., 10., 60., 100., output)
    draw_letter_c(10., 120., 60., 100., output)
    draw_letter_g(10., 230., 60., 100., output)
    draw_letter_t(10., 340., 60., 100., output)




[docs]def draw_dense_letters(emissions, xsize, xposition, yposition, step,
        previous_position_proba, index_letter, output):
    for j in range(0, 4):
        proba, letter = emissions[j]
        ysize = 100. * proba
        if letter == 'A':
            draw_letter_a(
                xposition, yposition, xsize, ysize, output,
                opacity=previous_position_proba[index_letter])
        elif letter == 'C':
            draw_letter_c(
                xposition, yposition, xsize, ysize, output,
                opacity=previous_position_proba[index_letter])
        elif letter == 'G':
            draw_letter_g(
                xposition, yposition, xsize, ysize, output,
                opacity=previous_position_proba[index_letter])
        elif letter == 'T':
            draw_letter_t(
                xposition, yposition, xsize, ysize, output,
                opacity=previous_position_proba[index_letter])
        if j < 3:
            yposition += ysize
    yposition += ysize + step
    return yposition




[docs]def draw_summary_letters(emissions, xsize, xposition, yposition, step, entropy,
        output):
    max_size = (2. - entropy) * 50.
    yposition = 10. + 100. - max_size
    for j in range(0, 4):
        proba, letter = emissions[j]
        ysize = max_size * proba
        if letter == 'A':
            draw_letter_a(xposition, yposition, xsize, ysize, output)
        elif letter == 'C':
            draw_letter_c(xposition, yposition, xsize, ysize, output)
        elif letter == 'G':
            draw_letter_g(xposition, yposition, xsize, ysize, output)
        elif letter == 'T':
            draw_letter_t(xposition, yposition, xsize, ysize, output)
        if j < 3:
            yposition += ysize
    return xposition + xsize + step, yposition + ysize + step




[docs]def draw_frame(header_x_coord, header_y_coord, axis_length, axis_x_coord,
        axis_y_coord, output):
    print_header(header_x_coord, header_y_coord, output)
    draw_axis(axis_length, output, axis_x_coord, axis_y_coord)




[docs]def get_position_start(tffm):
    """
    Return the position (0-based) of the first matching state of the tffm.
    """
    if tffm.kind == "1st-order":
        return 2
    else:
        return 1


# The computation of the information content is done within the drawing since
# it follows the same algorithm computing the emission probabilities. So we do
# not call the get_information_content method for an algorithmic improvement.


[docs]def draw_logo_letters(tffm, logo_type, output, xposition=90., xsize=50.,
        step=10.):
    """
    Draw the letters of the logo and return the IC to be printed
    """
    previous_position_proba = tffm.background_emission_proba()
    information_content = 0.
    start = get_position_start(tffm)
    for position in range(start, len(tffm) + start):
        position_proba = {'A': 0., 'C': 0., 'G': 0., 'T': 0.}
        yposition = 10.
        for i in range(0, 4):
            if logo_type == "summary":
                __ = tffm_module.get_emission_update_pos_proba(tffm,
                        position_proba, position, previous_position_proba, i)
            else:
                emissions = tffm_module.get_emission_update_pos_proba(tffm,
                        position_proba, position, previous_position_proba, i)
                yposition = draw_dense_letters(emissions, xsize, xposition,
                        yposition, step, previous_position_proba, ALPHABET[i],
                        output)
        previous_position_proba = position_proba.copy()
        if tffm.kind == "detailed":
            somme = sum(previous_position_proba.values())
            for nucleotide in iter(previous_position_proba):
                previous_position_proba[nucleotide] /= somme
        values = previous_position_proba.values()
        keys = previous_position_proba.keys()
        emissions_tuple = zip(values, keys)
        entropy = tffm_module.compute_entropy(emissions_tuple)
        information_content += 2. - entropy
        if logo_type == "summary":
            emissions_tuple.sort(reverse=True)
            xposition, yposition = draw_summary_letters(emissions_tuple, xsize,
                    xposition, yposition, step, entropy, output)
        else:
            xposition += xsize + step
    return information_content




[docs]def draw_logo(tffm, logo_type, output):
    """ Print the logo in svg format to the output file """
    # Print the header.
    header_y_coord = 60 * (len(tffm) + 2)
    if logo_type == "summary":
        draw_frame(170, header_y_coord, len(tffm), 80, 120, output)
        draw_y_axis(output)
    else:
        draw_frame(500, header_y_coord, len(tffm), 80, 450, output)
        draw_left_letters(output)
    information_content = draw_logo_letters(tffm, logo_type, output)
    if logo_type == "summary":
        print_ic(len(tffm) + 2, information_content, output, 80, 120)
    else:
        print_ic(len(tffm) + 2, information_content, output, 80, 450)
    print_footer(output)
